featureType.name: antarctic_accum_crossover_errors
featureType.title: accum_crossover_errors
featureType.nativeCRS: GEOGCS["WGS 84", DATUM["World Geodetic System 1984", SPHEROID["WGS 84", 6378137.0, 298.257223563, AUTHORITY["EPSG","7030"]], AUTHORITY["EPSG","6326"]], PRIMEM["Greenwich", 0.0, AUTHORITY["EPSG","8901"]], UNIT["degree", 0.017453292519943295], AXIS["Geodetic longitude", EAST], AXIS["Geodetic latitude", NORTH], AUTHORITY["EPSG","4326"]]

latLonBoundingBox.crs: GEOGCS["WGS84(DD)", DATUM["WGS84", SPHEROID["WGS84", 6378137.0, 298.257223563]], PRIMEM["Greenwich", 0.0], UNIT["degree", 0.017453292519943295], AXIS["Geodetic longitude", EAST], AXIS["Geodetic latitude", NORTH]]

virtualTable.name: accum_crossover_errors
virtualTable.sql: SELECT cx.geom, ABS(cx.layer_elev_1-cx.layer_elev_2) AS error FROM accum_crossover_errors cx JOIN accum_segments sgs1 ON cx.segment_1_id=sgs1.id JOIN accum_segments sgs2 ON cx.segment_2_id=sgs2.id JOIN accum_seasons ss1 ON cx.season_1_name=ss1.name JOIN accum_seasons ss2 ON cx.season_2_name=ss2.name WHERE (layer_id = %layer_id% OR layer_id IS NULL) AND cx.location_id = %location_id% AND ss1.season_group_id IN (%season_group_ids%) AND ss2.season_group_id IN (%season_group_ids%) AND ss1.name IN (%season_name%) AND ss2.name IN (%season_name%) AND sgs1.name > %start_seg% AND sgs1.name < %stop_seg% AND sgs2.name > %start_seg% AND sgs2.name < %stop_seg% UNION SELECT cx.geom, NULL AS error FROM accum_crossovers cx JOIN accum_point_paths pp1 ON cx.point_path_1_id=pp1.id JOIN accum_point_paths pp2 ON cx.point_path_2_id=pp2.id JOIN accum_seasons ss1 ON pp1.season_id=ss1.id JOIN accum_seasons ss2 ON pp2.season_id=ss2.id JOIN accum_segments sgs1 ON pp1.segment_id=sgs1.id JOIN accum_segments sgs2 ON pp2.segment_id=sgs2.id WHERE pp1.location_id= %location_id% AND ss1.season_group_id IN (%season_group_ids%) AND ss2.season_group_id IN (%season_group_ids%) AND ss1.name IN (%season_name%) AND ss2.name IN (%season_name%) AND sgs1.name > %start_seg% AND sgs1.name < %stop_seg% AND sgs2.name > %start_seg% AND sgs2.name < %stop_seg% AND cx.id NOT IN (SELECT cross_id FROM accum_crossover_errors WHERE layer_id=%layer_id%)
